text: Female mice were used at 8-12 weeks old , and animal protocols were approved according to the Animals ( Scientific Procedures ) Act 1986 , Home Office , UK .

Reagents , including antibodies for Tcell and DC preparation , purification and culture , media , cytokines , and cytokine mAbs have been described ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ; Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ; Veldhoen etal . , 2009 ; Veldhoen etal . , 2006 ) .
